remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象封装有关应用程序的安全决策。 objects encapsulate security decisions about an application.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中所含对象`trusts`追加到集合的末尾。The objects contained in `trusts` are appended to the end of the collection. 你可以使用方法将应用程序信任对象的另一个集合快速添加到集合，而不必手动将每个应用程序信任添加到集合使用方法。You can use the method to quickly add another collection of application trust objects to the collection instead of manually adding each application trust to the collection using the method. 若要删除以前添加的应用程序信任的范围，使用方法。To remove a range of application trusts that you previously added, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口，可用于在集合内移动。The implements the interface that allows you to move within a collection. 使用当前获取的项的属性指向集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法将移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法将枚举器移到其初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to its initial position. > [!NOTE] > 创建枚举器，或使用后方法来重新枚举数定位在集合的开始然后，你必须调用方法将枚举数定位到第一个项。After you create the enumerator, or use the method to reposition the enumerator to the start of the collection, you must then call the method to position the enumerator to the first item. 否则，表示的项属性是不确定。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined.

summary.span: Removes the specified application trust from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将搜索整个集合，并删除指定的应用程序信任的所有实例。The entire collection is searched, and all instances of the specified application trust are removed. 请按照被移除的对象的对象将上移以占据空出的位置。The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions. 移动的对象的索引也将更新。The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过为确切版本匹配，依赖于的值确定应用程序信任`versionMatch`参数。The application trust can be identified by an exact version match, dependent upon the value of the `versionMatch` parameter. 方法可用于查找所有匹配的应用程序信任，并从集合中移除的匹配项。The method is used to locate all matching application trusts, and the matching items are removed from the collection. 请按照被移除的对象的对象将上移以占据空出的位置。The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions. 移动的对象的索引也将更新。The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.
